scripts.usemin: usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html && usemin calendar.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/calendar.html && usemin fineprint.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/fineprint.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin placestovisit.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/placestovisit.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin &&  npm run usemin
